Summary: Changed from triangle to orb, glowing, with flame coming from tips of triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside trying to view the Northern Lights projected to be seen tonight. Suddenly, to our south, we noticed a light in the sky that appeared to be a triangle with flame coming from the corners and then it appeared to turn into an orb and was going all over the sky. Two others appeared from different directions.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around January 24th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
